name: Goblin Heist
description:
Steal the Goblins’ Treasure while making sure you’re not seen!

See if you can get yourself onto the Global Leaderboard!

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move.
  • Goblins have predictable patterns, watch for them.
  • Your score will deplete over time, be quick!

(The game doesn't work in Chrome Incognito mode)

Music by sawsquarenoise
